meanings.definition: A person who believes in or promotes conspiracy theories.
meanings.sent1: Some conspiracists think the moon landing was faked.
meanings.sent2: Conspiracists often share their ideas online.
meanings.sent3: The group of conspiracists had a secret meeting in the basement.
meanings.sent4: She was surrounded by a cloud of conspiracists, whispering their theories.
meanings.sent5: The image of the conspiracists wearing tin foil hats stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in conspiracies or plots.
meanings.sent1: The conspiracists planned to overthrow the government.
meanings.sent2: The group of conspiracists met in a dimly lit room.
meanings.sent3: The conspiracists' plot to steal the cookies was foiled by the dog.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was in a movie surrounded by a group of conspiracists.
meanings.sent5: The conspiracists moved silently through the shadows, carrying out their plan.
